thread.title: Frank-Walter Steinmeier Is Elected as Germany’s President
thread.title_full: Frank-Walter Steinmeier Is Elected as Germany’s President - WSJ

author: Friedrich Geiger
title: Frank-Walter Steinmeier Is Elected as Germany’s President
text:
BERLIN—Former German Foreign Minister Frank-Walter Steinmeier was elected president on Sunday, taking on the prestigious but largely ceremonial position months before rival Chancellor Angela Merkel faces a big election test.

Lawmakers and regional representatives voted for Mr. Steinmeier at the capital’s Reichstag building, after Ms. Merkel’s conservative parties and their junior coalition partner, Mr. Steinmeier’s Social Democrats,...
